thread.section_title: Goldline Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goldline | www.goldline.com | 4 of 181
thread.title: Vernon

author: Vernon
title: Vernon
text: The staff at Goldline were candid and very patient. Ms Sue Gold was very informative, answered every question and followed through on every suggestion I had regarding the structure of the purchase. The questions she asked of me were very intelligent and allowed her fully understand my goals and strategy. She never hesitated to crunch the numbers on at least five or more times and then fully explain the consequences. As a result, I was able to confirm the numbers at my end. This allowed the purchase process to be a great experience. Thank you Goldline.
